data.name: Red Algorithm - Pickaxe
data.detailed_description:
Double your rune drop rate forever for all heroes in Red Algorithm with this pickaxe!

Details

  • This DLC doesn't contain any files to download, it just unlocks the pickaxe
  • To unlock the pickaxe with the DLC you need an active connection to Steam
  • You can see rune drop rate chance (rdr) in the game if you turn on "Dev Stats" in settings

Here is an example of how it works. Let's say that we are playing in Hard Mode and it's the 7th minute right now. According to the rune drop table that you can find in the game (or on the screenshot above), your chances of getting a new rune in Hard Mode in 5 - 15 minutes are 15% per minute. Let's also say that you completed 20 achievements, which gives you an additional 5%. So, you have 15 + 5 = 20% chance to find a rune every minute. Good, but not great. With this pickaxe, you will double this chance to 40% per minute!

This DLC doesn't make you stronger in the game, it just speeds up the rune farming / grinding process and saves you time, so you can max out your favourite heroes faster and show the best you can do with all the runes.

You can also check out this guide to learn more about runes in the game.
